alert.note: Alert for Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 6:26PM CDT until July 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Madison County in north central Alabama... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 626 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northwestern Huntsville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Redstone Arsenal, Owens Cross Roads, Gurley, Alabama A And M University, University Of Alabama In Huntsville and Harvest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
